about_the_game:
The Wandering Demon Blade is a melancholy, action platformer, with a focus on fast paced Sword Combat with quick reaction times and decision making.

Fast Combat : Fights are difficult and a degree of mastery will go a long way. Death will come quickly and naturally to everyone involved. How quickly a battle starts and ends may impact the next. Every fighter can hold their own but only you will survive.

Mysterious Purpose : Waking up in a shadowed world with no knowledge of how, learn about the Demon Blade's past, present, and future through an enigmatic story told by 3rd person accounts. Piece together the clues to figure out the meaning behind the Demon Blade.

Silenced Game : The world is a quiet place; only filled with sounds often overlooked. These sounds help portray the story and the purpose of the Demon Blade.
